name: Robot DragonKnight:Amazing Toy Fight
description:
Like solve the assembled game? Like robot? Want battle with monsters? Robot Dragon Knight is the best one for you! Fighting like an autobots!

In this game, you will meet multiple bosses and would use your skill to defeat them. Good lucky!

Key Feature:
- Get the pieces out of the box.
- Create a knight robot to fight.
- Be the domination of the city.
- Defeat the boss with your cool skill.

You will enjoy the awesome fighting experience！
